name: Mountain Pose
healthBenefit: Improves posture and strengthens the legs, ankles, and core muscles.

name: Tree Pose
healthBenefit: Improves balance, strengthens the legs and ankles, and promotes focus and concentration.

name: Downward Facing Dog
healthBenefit: Stretches and strengthens the entire body, improves digestion, and relieves stress and fatigue.

name: Warrior II Pose
healthBenefit: Builds strength and stability in the legs, opens the hips and chest, and improves stamina.

name: Child's Pose
healthBenefit: Relaxes the body and mind, releases tension in the back and shoulders, and promotes deep breathing and relaxation.

name: Seated Forward Bend
healthBenefit: Stretches the spine, hamstrings, and shoulders, stimulates digestion, and calms the mind.
